about_the_game:
Awakening in a strange land never seen before

Lit by the missing great one in the sky

This endless night that nobody asked for

Where hope was left to die

Will you embrace this fate or will you fight against it ?

Moonlit is a first person exploration and adventure game with a dark fantasy setting.
Awakened in a land with a shattered moon and an endless night letting monster roam freely try to uncover the mystery behind this strange phenomenon. With your courage and your lantern explore this place and put an end to this nightmare.



In this game emotions and feelings are put into the spotlight, talk with the folks and learn more about them and even more about you.
Explore your past life through burst of remembrances and accept what you've turned yourself into.



With unique graphic style explore everything the game as to show at your own pace.
Contemplate each area of the game with the sweet soundtrack made to embark you on a true journey.



Progress with your lantern by solving puzzles, challenges and outsmarting monsters before having their claws close up on you.
Each part of the world has something different to offer, your mind will be put to the test.

content_descriptors.notes: Moonlit contains some act of violence and addresses sensitive subject like : sucidal thought and acts, grief, depression.

name: Moonlit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 Series or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: A dark, king's field inspired, exploration game.Explore your mind and emotions through the inhabitant of this place and put a end to all of their problems.
